Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the hemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 12 and σ = 0.6. We randomly draw one person from this population. How high should the Hb of this person be at most to be among the lowest 15% of the population? belong?

Answerlist
----------

* 10.4248
* 11.2621
* 11.3781
* 11.9632

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 10.4248: Incorrect
* 11.2621: Incorrect
* 11.3781: Correct
* 11.9632: Incorrect
